name: Android
desc: A synthetic humanoid ancestry created by artificial means. Most common in Numeria.

name: Aphorite
desc: A type of planar scion descended from a being from Axis, the Plane of Law.

name: Azarketi
desc:
Amphibious humanoids who live among the seas of the Inner Sea region, said to have descended from the people of Azlant. Sometimes known as gillmen or Low Azlanti.

Azarketis craft and use these weapons.

name: Beastkin
desc: Humanoids that can partially or fully transform into animal forms.

name: Conrasu
desc: A people that are made of cosmic force given consciousness and housed within unique exoskeletons. Conrasus craft and use these weapons.

name: Fleshwarp
desc: A humanoid transformed so completely by outside forces that they are now a unique ancestry.

name: Ganzi
desc: A planar scion descended from a chaotic being of the Maelstrom, such as a protean.

name: Geniekin
desc: An umbrella term for planar scions descended from beings from the Elemental Planes. Geniekin craft and use these weapons.

name: Kitsune
desc: Shapeshifting humanoids whose true forms resemble foxes.

name: Resonant
desc: This weapon can channel energy damage. You gain the Conduct Energy free action while wielding a resonant weapon.
effectDesc: Activate this trait to grant the appropriate additional damage to the weapon.

name: Strix
desc: Winged humanoids, most of whom live in and around Cheliax.
